item.title: Here's where it's toughest for the middle class to find an affordable home
item.description: Households earning $75,000 can afford only 1 in 5 for-sale homes, down from half of all listed properties before the pandemic, a new study finds.

item.title: Sean "Diddy" Combs trial live updates: Cassie faces cross examination
item.description: Cassie Ventura is back on the stand for cross-examination in the Sean "Diddy" Combs trial after accusing him of raping her in 2018.

item.title: Dick's Sporting Goods to buy ailing Foot Locker for $2.4 billion
item.description: Foot Locker is the second major U.S. shoe company to be acquired in recent weeks as tariffs hit footwear industry.

item.title: 5/15: CBS Morning News
item.description: Trump heads to UAE for final stop on Middle East trip; NFL releases 2025 season schedule.

item.title: Tiny Desk expands to radio as NPR concert series hits 20 million monthly viewers
item.description: NPR's popular Tiny Desk concert series now airs as a weekly radio show hosted by Bobby Carter and Anamaria Sayre. They join Nate Burleson to talk abou...
